name: Lex software soulutions
subtitle: Home made beautiful applications
description: Lex Software Solutions! We specialize in providing innovative, customized software solutions tailored to your unique needs. Whether you’re looking for desktop, mobile, or cloud-based applications, we deliver cutting-edge technology designed to perform seamlessly across all platforms. Our expert team is dedicated to transforming your vision into reality, ensuring efficient, scalable, and user-friendly solutions for businesses of all sizes. Explore our range of services and experience the future of software, built just for you!

apps.name: CaSSAndRA native
apps.subtitle: CaSSAndRA native. A new UI for CaSSAndRA
apps.localizedDescription: CaSSAndRA native is an innovative app designed to transform the way you manage your robotic lawn mowers. With its sleek, intuitive interface, this app allows you to monitor, configure, and control your entire fleet of mowers seamlessly from one central dashboard. Key features include real-time performance tracking, easy scheduling, and customizable mowing patterns, giving you complete control over every mower. Whether you manage one robot or a whole fleet, our solution offers unparalleled simplicity and efficiency across all devices. Take charge of your mowing fleet with CaSSAndRA native. For more information, visit forum.ardumower.de or check out the GitHub page to join the community and stay up to date with the latest updates and features!

versions.localizedDescription: - Bug fix in update settings command

- Robot connection settings available
- API settings available
- Message service settings available
- Robot position mode settings available

- Interactive state window
- Moveable go to point (by long press)
- Cross mark on selected lasso point

- New state window in mobile mode
- Changed UI logic, the bottom command bar is removed
- Server version required 0.133.0

- Tasks visible after selection
- Changes on dropdown menus
- Server version required 0.130.0
- Tasks selection and starting mowing from tasks selection

privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: App scans the local network for available MQTT servers.

news.title: Test release of CaSSAndRA native
news.caption: We’re thrilled to announce the first test release of the CaSSAndRA native is now available for download via AltStore!
